snippet: The first trial of a senior Qaddafi-era official accused of crimes relating to last year’s war opened Tuesday.
abstract: Trial of former Libyan official Bouzaid Dorda begins; Dorda is charged with conspiring to kill civilians, providing weapons for the purpose of killing civilians and conspiring to provoke civil war and other crimes.
lead_paragraph: The first trial of a senior Qaddafi-era official accused of crimes relating to last year’s war opened Tuesday.

headline.main: Libya: Trial Opens for Ex-Spy Chief
headline.print_headline: Libya: Trial Opens for Ex-Spy Chief
